create_conversation.description: Creates a new conversation with a bot.

props.name: name
props.description: The name for the new conversation.

props.name: document_ids
props.description: A list of document IDs to limit the bot's knowledge base for this conversation.

create_document_from_text.description: Upload text content to create a new document within the Cody knowledge base.

props.name: name
props.description: The name or title of the new document.

props.name: content
props.description: The text or HTML content to be added to the document. Max 768 KB.

find_bot.description: Finds a bot based on its name.

props.name: name
props.description: The name of the bot to search for. The search is case-insensitive and partial.

find_conversation.description: Finds a conversation based on its name and/or the bot it belongs to.

props.name: name
props.description: The name of the conversation to search for (partial match).

send_message.description: Send your message and receive the AI-generated response.

props.name: content
props.description: The message to send to the conversation. (Max 2000 characters)

upload_file.description: Add a file directly into a specific folder in the knowledge base.

props.name: file
props.description: The file to upload (e.g., txt, md, rtf, pdf, ppt, docx).
